help.description: This command simply informs you on the commands available and serves as a starting point for new users.

ping.description: This command tells you the ping which is the amount of time it takes for the bot to respond to a request. This number may be quite high.

coinflip.description: This command flips a coin and tells you whether the result was Heads or Tails. Not that exciting.

info.description: This command tells you some useful links relating to the bot and some other nifty statistics.

encrypt.description: (Only works in DM) This command encrypt your inputted text. The encryption is very weak so don't use it for any important information.

decrypt.description: (Only works in DM) This command decrypts your encrypted text. You can only decrypt text that you encrypted using ChigBot.

server.description: This command tells you useful information about the server you are currently in.
